alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 4:18AM MST until November 18 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph. * WHERE...Fort Collins, and Greeley. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes, with lingering impacts possible Friday morning even as snow ends.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
